text_guardianAddress_representsInGuardia: Represents the Guardian in the Guardians list
text_guardianAddress_usedByDelegatorsToD: Used by Delegators to delegate to the Guardian
text_nodeAddress_usedToSignBlocks: Used by the node to sign blocks on Orbs blockchain

text_nodeAddress_doesNotHoldYourTokens: Does NOT hold your Guardian ORBS tokens
